stu_tags: CARING  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Math is absolutely my worst subject, but I ended up getting an A in her class because she explains the material so well. She is very helpful when going to office hours, and really takes the time to make sure you understand the concepts. Best math teacher I have ever had.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Her class is straight forward. She gives notes to print out on titanium(print them out!). There is a test every other Tuesday and no test on weeks with exams. Her grading was 25% final, 50% exams(there are 4) 12.5% Homework(using webassign) 5% quizzes, 2.5% classwork(just show up on key dates), 5% writing assignment(group project)

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  EXTRA CREDIT
comments: I took her for business calculus, it was a hard subject, but she made it seem easier than I thought. Throughout the semester i got an A. Finals were a bit harsh and ended up with a B+ overall. NO TEXTBOOK. All homework is online, very tedious and has nothing to do with tests or finals. Her study guides she posted helps a lot, finals is half of it.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: The class is fairly easy to pass if you show up and try. However, the homework is nothing like the material in class and it\'s online to make it worse! She curves the homework but gives a big boost to those who have a grade of a B and not so much of a curve if you have a C or lower

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I hated this teacher. As a freshman she only made my experience horrid. She teaches very fast and isnt clear when explaining. I would not recommend ger at all.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: One of the best professors at CSUF. She explains the material clearly. She\'s very helpful with the homework, the night before hw is due she allow you to ask questions in class. Exams are fair just study notes and hw.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Really nice teacher. You pretty much have to have an IQ lower than 100 In order to fail. She explains every step as she\'s doing examples. Writing project was easy, just be careful who you pick. Before tests she gives you a review sheet, which are really helpful, & posts solutions online. I really wish she taught math 150B, save your notes!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Peralta is one of the friendliest teachers i\'ve had. Make sure to print notes and take notes during class, it\'ll help a lot. TAKE THE SI CLASS TOO, IT HELPS EVEN MORE. She is really understanding too as long as you communicate with her.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I absolutely adore Professor Peralta. She is extremely nice and always helps you with whatever you need. She responds to emails fast and she\'s a very fair grader. Definitely put in some hard work for this class. 4 Exams 1 Final,daily online homework,quizzes, and one project so be prepared to spend lots of time with math.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Awesome professor, she is very friendly. She goes over the material very throughly. She uses MyMathLab for homework. Attend class or you will fall behind. Overall I would recommend her to anyone.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I highly recommend her. She explains the material very clearly and is extremely helpful. She is young so she kinda understands your position. Very nice and seems like a shy person. Overall she\'s great and I enjoyed her class very much.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Really good professor, don\'t have much to say except she does a really good job explaining the material. She also helps with extra credit throughout the semester.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: The subject matter isn\'t the easiest thing in the world to initially understand, but she makes it very reasonable to grasp, if you put in the time and effort. Homework twice weekly, 4 tests, 2 projects. She is always there to help you out if you need advice, and she offers quizzes as extra credit towards exams. All in all, highly recommended.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: She\'s an amazing professor. She\'s young and understanding of the struggles that students have with math. You have to try extremely hard to fail this class. She basically gives you the answers.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I thought she was a really good professor. She was super nice and was very helpful. I understood everything she taught, and whenever i needed help on the homework she was always there to help. The only thing i didn\'t like was the fact that she made us buy the textbook and we didn\'t use it once. Not once!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I hate the way she teaches. This was a math 40 (remedial class) and i have no idea what she was talking about during the entire semester. I hate math and i felt like she didnt take the time to fully explain everything. This was a waste of a semester since i am going to have to retake this class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Super nice and teaches really well. A lot of my homework questions didn\'t reflect what she taught us in class and I had to learn on my own. But, all in all, a very nice professor.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This professor is super nice. i hate math and im horrible at it, but she makes it so easy to understand. she speaks clearly and moves at a great pace...especially if math isn\'t your strongest subject. she looks really young so i think she\'s fairly new, but i highly recommend her!
